text: Joseph Altairac (25 March 1957 – 9 November 2020) was a French literary critic and essayist. His works focused in science fiction literature and was secretary of the Prix Rosny-Aîné. His articles and works were dedicated to A. E. van Vogt, H. P. Lovecraft, and H. G. Wells. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Literary critics Category:French essayists Category:French critics
title: Joseph Altairac
